items.title: Best of 9to5Toys early Black Friday edition – All of this week’s best deals: Apple, Google, Samsung, Levi’s, more
items.summary:
Good morning and welcome to Best of 9to5Toys Weekly – a one-stop shop for all of the week’s best deals and this week it’s all about the early Black Friday events. The second batch of Best Buy Black Friday Doorbusters are live through the weekend, today is your last chance at the official Target early Black Friday deals, and there loads of other big-time early sales now live. We have the best prices ever on the M4 MacBook Air lineup, as well as the new M5 MacBook Pro, not to mention up to $300 off Google Pixel 10 devices, a massive Levi’s sale, early LEGO deals, and a whole lot more. Scope it all out down below.

items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. This week was headlined by Best Buy’s early Black Friday deals rollout, delivering up to $900 off gaming laptops, desktops, Copilot+ PCs, and more. We also saw steep Samsung monitor discounts, with the likes of the brand’s Odyssey G6 “world’s first 500Hz OLED” monitor hitting fresh lows. There was no shortage of deals on peripherals like keyboards, mice, and controllers either, many of which are still live and waiting for you below in this week’s Battlestation Weekly.

items.title: Electrified Weekly – early Black Friday sales from Lectric, Rad Power, EcoFlow, Anker, and much more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. With the first week of November coming to a close, we have a large collection of early Black Friday sales, particularly on e-bikes and power stations. Leading the e-bikes is Lectric’s Black Friday event with up to $893 savings on e-bike bundles starting from $999, with a side sale providing up to 25% discounts on 16 different extra batteries starting from $270. There’s plenty more to get excited about from Rad Power, Velotric, Heybike, as well as power station sales from EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX, Jackery – not to mention the MANY exclusive new low prices we’ve secured, and more. Head below to see the best of what we’ve spotted this week.

more…

Kicking off November, reader favorites have included iOttie’s Tesla Model 3/Y USB-C charging hub for $16, a couple of 10-hat organizers for $7 each, and finally, the iOttie Treker airplane MagSafe mount at $20. items.title: Clean up the yard before the snow flies with this 31-gallon deck box for $29 (Reg. $35)
items.summary:
Greesum 31-Gallon Resin Deck Box

Buy for $29 (Reg. $35)

What we love

Depending on where you live, snow may start to fly in the near future (it’s slated to hit where I live this weekend). For the folks that still have a bit of tidying up to do in the yard, this sort of outdoor-ready storage can really come in handy. It boasts a 31-gallon storage cavity and when closed it can also be used for seating.

items.title: Add front and rear coverage to your car with REDTIGER’s F7NP dual dash cam at $85 (Reg. $130)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, REDTIGER is offering its F7NP Front and Rear Dash Cam for $85.48 shipped. Coming down off its $130 full price tag, we saw regular discounts taking the costs down to $90 until July, when that month’s Prime Day event first gave us the first drop to this rate, which has been regularly returning in the months since. While it has gone lower in the past, you’re still getting another shot at this solid 43% markdown that cuts $45 off the tag for one of its lowest prices at Amazon.

more…

items.title: Amazon one-ups Target with an even better early Black Friday Levi’s sale, up to 50% off
items.summary:
Amazon kicked off an early Black Friday Levi’s sale, offering up to 50% off tons of classic styles for the whole family. This sale is definitely giving Target’s sale a run for its money. You’ll find deals on everything from jeans and chinos to jackets and shirts, available in a wide range of sizes, styles, colors, and even Big & Tall options. Whether you’re restocking your denim or looking to upgrade to a different style, now’s the time to score some classic Levi’s jeans at a fraction of the cost. Shop the full Levi’s sale on Amazon here.
